Text: would be nice if you added who or what companies in your titles
thanx for all ur work. greatly appreciated.

@ Lestatvvvvvv - Go to GOOGLE, and search the phrase "Undercover Boss episode list" and you will find probably at least 2 lists - Wikipedia and IMDB where you can match the episode numbers up with show titles/descriptions. It's not rocket science.

Personally, I prefer the short titles with just the episode numbers. It makes it easier to follow and search. (visually)
